author: Source: Cotswold Journal
title: Remi Garde the early frontrunner to succeed Tim Sherwood as Aston... - Cotswold Journal
text:
The ex-Arsenal midfielder, who held talks with Newcastle last season, is available after leaving Lyon in 2014 to take a break for personal reasons. He spent three years in charge at the Stade de Gerland and won the Coupe de France in 2012 having previously won the Premier League in 1998 as a player with the Gunners.
 Cotswold Journal.
